Property.Name: ActivityDate
Property.DefinitionText: A date of an activity.

Property.Name: ActivityLocation
Property.DefinitionText: A location of an activity.

Property.Name: Date
Property.DefinitionText: A full date.

Property.Name: DateRepresentation
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a representation of a date.

Property.Name: GeographicCoordinateLatitude
Property.DefinitionText: A measurement of the angular distance between a point on the Earth and the Equator.

Property.Name: GeographicCoordinateLongitude
Property.DefinitionText: A measurement of the angular distance between a point on the Earth and the Prime Meridian.

Property.Name: IdentificationID
Property.DefinitionText: An identifier.

Property.Name: InjuryDescriptionText
Property.DefinitionText: A description of an injury.

Property.Name: InjurySeverityAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a severity of an injury received by a person involved into a Traffic Accident.

Property.Name: ItemLengthMeasure
Property.DefinitionText: A measurement of the length of an item.

Property.Name: LatitudeDegreeValue
Property.DefinitionText: A value that specifies the degree of a latitude. The value comes from a restricted range between -90 (inclusive) and +90 (inclusive).

Property.Name: LengthUnitAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a unit of measure for length.

Property.Name: Location2DGeospatialCoordinate
Property.DefinitionText: A location identified by a latitude and longitude.

Property.Name: LocationGeospatialCoordinateAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a geospatial location.

Property.Name: LongitudeDegreeValue
Property.DefinitionText: A value that specifies the degree of a longitude. The value comes from a restricted range between -180 (inclusive) and +180 (inclusive).

Property.Name: MeasureDecimalValue
Property.DefinitionText: A decimal measurement value.

Property.Name: MeasurePointAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a measurement value.

Property.Name: MeasureValueAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a measurement value.

Property.Name: MeasureValueText
Property.DefinitionText: A textual description of a measurement value.

Property.Name: Metadata
Property.DefinitionText: Information that further qualifies primary data; data about data.

Property.Name: Person
Property.DefinitionText: A human being.

Property.Name: PersonBirthDate
Property.DefinitionText: A date a person was born.

Property.Name: PersonGivenName
Property.DefinitionText: A first name of a person.

Property.Name: PersonMiddleName
Property.DefinitionText: A middle name of a person.

Property.Name: PersonName
Property.DefinitionText: A combination of names and/or titles by which a person is known.

Property.Name: PersonSurName
Property.DefinitionText: A last name or family name of a person.

Property.Name: PersonUnionAssociation
Property.DefinitionText: An association between two persons who are in a state of union with each other.

Property.Name: ReportedDate
Property.DefinitionText: A date information was observed, measured, identified, or became known.

Property.Name: RoleOfAbstract
Property.DefinitionText: A data concept for a property of a role object. This specifies the base object, of which the role object is a function.

Property.Name: RoleOfPerson
Property.DefinitionText: A person of whom the role object is a function.

Property.Name: personNameCommentText
Property.DefinitionText: A comment about a kind of name for a person.

Class.Name: ActivityType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a single or set of related actions, events, or process steps.

Class.Name: AssociationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for an association, connection, relationship, or involvement somehow linking people, things, and/or activities together.

Class.Name: DateType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a calendar date.

Class.Name: IdentificationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a representation of an identity.

Class.Name: IncidentType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for an occurrence or an event that may require a response.

Class.Name: InjuryType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a form of harm or damage sustained by a person.

Class.Name: LatitudeCoordinateType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a measurement of the angular distance between a point on the Earth and the Equator.

Class.Name: LengthMeasureType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a measure of a distance or extent.

Class.Name: Location2DGeospatialCoordinateType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a location identified by latitude and longitude.

Class.Name: LocationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for geospatial location.

Class.Name: LongitudeCoordinateType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a measurement of the angular distance between a point on the Earth and the Prime Meridian.

Class.Name: MeasureType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a measurement.

Class.Name: MetadataType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for information that further qualifies primary data; data about data.

Class.Name: PersonAssociationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for an association between people.

Class.Name: PersonNameTextType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a name by which a person is known, referred, or addressed.

Class.Name: PersonNameType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a combination of names and/or titles by which a person is known.

Class.Name: PersonType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a human being.

Class.Name: PersonUnionAssociationType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for an association between two persons who are in a state of union with each other.

Class.Name: ProperNameTextType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a word or phrase by which a person or thing is known, referred, or addressed.

Class.Name: TextType
Class.DefinitionText: A data type for a character string.

Datatype.Name: AngularMinuteType
Datatype.DefinitionText: A data type for a minute of a degree, with a restricted range of 0 (inclusive) to 60 (exclusive).

Datatype.Name: AngularSecondType
Datatype.DefinitionText: A data type for a second of a minute, with a restricted range of 0 (inclusive) to 60 (exclusive).

MaxExclusive.DefinitionText: The maximum value for an angular second.

MinInclusive.DefinitionText: The minimum value for an angular second.

Datatype.Name: LatitudeDegreeType
Datatype.DefinitionText: A data type for a degree of latitude.

MaxInclusive.DefinitionText: The maximum value for a latitude degree.

MinInclusive.DefinitionText: The minimum value for a latitude degree.

Datatype.Name: LongitudeDegreeType
Datatype.DefinitionText: A data type for a degree of longitude.

MaxInclusive.DefinitionText: The maximum value for a longitude degree.

MinInclusive.DefinitionText: The minimum value for a longitude degree.
